name: Pervis Principles: Volume 1
description: A Daily Meditation Book, is the first in a trilogy of books, crafted as a gift to young people.  Pervis Principles is a book of broad based truths and life lessons gleaned from a young man’s perspective and journey. The 3.5” by 5” book is designed as a modern day Proverbs for the new century.  Topics covered include: friendship, self-esteem, love, faith, career and vision.
